segments.text: Waiter , I would like to order now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you want to have today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you like your steak ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , what does that mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are several kinds of steaks . For example , you can have your steaks medium-rare , medium-well or well-done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for your explanation , I would like it well-done .
segments.speaker: S1
